title: Michael Carrick
summary: Michael Carrick (born 28 July 1981) is an English professional football manager and former player who was most recently the caretaker manager of Manchester United. He is one of the most decorated English footballers of all time and is best known for his 12-year playing career with Manchester United, whom he also captained.[3] Carrick was a central midfielder, but he was used as an emergency centre-back under Alex Ferguson, David Moyes, Louis van Gaal and Jos√© Mourinho. His playing style was grounded in his passing ability.[4][5]
